languages.text: "Запрос одобрен, как доктринально верный". {n}Паскаль склоняется над существом, и звук активировавшегося бура звучит ровно, успокаивающе и правильно. Голос техножреца вибрирует пронзительными надмировыми частотами.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл, да будут прерваны твои страдания".

"Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, its sound even, soothing, and right. The Tech-Priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let your suffering be discontinued!"
languages.original_text: "Запрос одобрен, как доктринально верный". {n}Паскаль склоняется над существом, и звук активировавшегося бура звучит ровно, успокаивающе и правильно. Голос техножреца вибрирует пронзительными надмировыми частотами.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл, да будут прерваны твои страдания".

traits.locale_text: "The request is approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature, and the sound of the activated drill sounds level and soothing. The tech-priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies.{/n} "May the cycle be broken, may your suffering be undone."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The request is approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature, and the sound of the activated drill sounds level and soothing. The tech-priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies.{/n} "May the cycle be broken, may your suffering be undone."

The Tech-Priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, may your suffering be undone!"

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「要求は教義上正しいものとして承認された」{n}パスカルが生き物の上に身を乗り出すと、ドリルの音が単調に、なだめるように、正確に響く。技術司祭の声は甲高い異世界の周波数で振動している。{/n} 「サイクルを止めよ、苦しみが止まるように！」
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, its sound even, soothing, and right. The Tech-Priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let your suffering be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: 「要求は教義上正しいものとして承認された」{n}パスカルが生き物の上に身を乗り出すと、ドリルの音が単調に、なだめるように、正確に響く。技術司祭の声は甲高い異世界の周波数で振動している。{/n} 「サイクルを止めよ、苦しみが止まるように！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “请求符合教义，已接受。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身子，电钻嗡嗡作响，声音听起来舒缓而平和。帕斯卡的声音听起来仿佛来自另一个世界。{/n}“让循环终止！让你的痛苦就此结束！”
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, its sound even, soothing, and right. The Tech-Priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let your suffering be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: “请求符合教义，已接受。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身子，看着这台机械，电钻的声音听起来舒缓而平和。帕斯卡的声音听起来仿佛来自另一个世界。{/n}“让循环终止！让你的痛苦就此结束！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Solicitud aprobada como doctrinalmente correcta». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre la criatura y el perforadora vibra con un sonido relajante y correcto. La voz del tecnosacerdote vibra con frecuencias estridentes de otro mundo.{/n} «¡Que se interrumpa el ciclo, que se interrumpa su sufrimiento!».
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, its sound even, soothing, and right. The Tech-Priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let your suffering be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: «Solicitud aprobada como doctrinalmente correcta». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre la criatura y el sonido de la perforadora es relajante y correcto. La voz del tecnosacerdote vibra con frecuencias estridentes de otro mundo.{/n} «¡Que se interrumpa el ciclo, que se acabe su sufrimiento!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Anfrage akzeptiert, da sie im Einklang mit der Doktrin steht." {n}Als sich Pasqal über die Kreatur beugt, klingt das Summen des Bohrers irgendwie beruhigend und richtig. In der Stimme des Techpriesters vibrieren schrille andersweltliche Frequenzen:{/n} "Möge der Zyklus unterbrochen werden und Euer Leid enden!"
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, its sound even, soothing, and right. The Tech-Priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let your suffering be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage akzeptiert, da sie im Einklang mit der Doktrin steht." {n}Pasqal beugt sich über die Kreatur. Das Geräusch, als sich sein Bohrer einschaltet, klingt gleichmäßig, beruhigend, korrekt. In der Stimme des Techpriesters vibrieren schrille andersweltliche Frequenzen.{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde, möge Euer Leid enden!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Demande approuvée, conforme à la doctrine. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur la créature et sa perceuse se remet à vrombir avec douceur et précision. La voix du technoprêtre vibre sur une fréquence presque surnaturelle.{/n} « Que le Cycle soit rompu, et que cesse la souffrance ! »
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, its sound even, soothing, and right. The Tech-Priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let your suffering be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: « Demande approuvée, conforme à la doctrine. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur la créature et sa perceuse se remet à l'œuvre avec douceur et précision. La voix du technoprêtre vibre sur une fréquence presque surnaturelle.{/n} « Que le Cycle soit rompu, et que cessent vos souffrances ! »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Talebin öğretilerle uyumlu olduğu onaylandı." {n}Yaratığa eğilen Pasqal'ın matkabının vızıltısı, kulağa pürüzsüz, rahatlatıcı ve doğru geliyor. Tekno Rahip'in sesi, dünya dışı frekansların uğultularıyla titriyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun! Acılarının süreği bozulsun!"
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, its sound even, soothing, and right. The Tech-Priest's voice vibrates with shrill otherworldly frequencies:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let your suffering be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: "Talebin öğretilerle uyumlu olduğu onaylandı." {n}Pasqal yaratığa eğiliyor ve matkabının vızıltısı kulağa pürüzsüz, rahatlatıcı ve doğru geliyor. Tekno Rahip'in sesi, dünya dışı frekansların uğultularıyla titriyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun! Acılarının süreği bozulsun!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
